birth_place.zh-cn: 台北州新庄郡鹭洲庄水湳

death_place.zh-cn: 台北市中正区台大医院

description.zh-cn: 中华民国企业家及政治人物，联邦集团与《自由时报》创办人。曾任中华民国监察院副院长、监察委员、立法委员，被视为前总统李登辉在商界的强力支持者。
description.en: A Taiwanese entrepreneur and politician, founder of the Federal Group and the Liberty Times. He served as Vice President of the Control Yuan, Control Yuan Member, and Legislator of the Republic of China, and was considered a strong supporter of former President Lee Teng-hui in the business community.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国监察院的副首长职位。
description.en: The position of the deputy head of the Control Yuan of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，林荣三的前任监察院副院长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, predecessor of Lin Rong-san as Vice President of the Control Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，林荣三的继任监察院副院长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, successor of Lin Rong-san as Vice President of the Control Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾在林荣三担任监察院副院长及监察委员期间担任监察院院长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as President of the Control Yuan during Lin Rong-san's tenure as Vice President and Member of the Control Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国监察院的成员职位。
description.en: The position of a member of the Control Yuan of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾在林荣三担任监察委员期间担任监察院院长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as President of the Control Yuan during Lin Rong-san's tenure as a Control Yuan Member.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国立法院的成员职位。
description.en: The position of a member of the Legislative Yuan of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由林荣三创办的企业集团，业务横跨地产、金融、传媒等领域。
description.en: An enterprise group founded by Lin Rong-san, with businesses spanning real estate, finance, and media.

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾大学的附属医院，林荣三在此逝世。
description.en: The affiliated hospital of National Taiwan University, where Lin Rong-san passed away.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的主要政党之一，林荣三曾长期为其党员。
description.en: One of the major political parties in the Republic of China, of which Lin Rong-san was a long-time member.

description.zh-cn: 日治台湾台北州新庄郡的行政区，为林荣三的出生地，今为新北市芦洲区。
description.en: An administrative division of Shinjō District, Taihoku Prefecture during the Japanese rule of Taiwan. It is the birthplace of Lin Rong-san, now known as Luzhou District, New Taipei City.

description.zh-cn: 林荣三之父。
description.en: Father of Lin Rong-san.

description.zh-cn: 林荣三之母。
description.en: Mother of Lin Rong-san.

description.zh-cn: 林荣三的大哥，宏国集团创办人。
description.en: Lin Rong-san's eldest brother, founder of the Hung Kuo Group.

description.zh-cn: 林荣三的二哥，宏泰集团创办人。
description.en: Lin Rong-san's second elder brother, founder of the Hung Tai Group.

description.zh-cn: 林荣三的姪子，林堉琪之长子，曾任宏国建设副董事长、台北101董事长兼总经理。
description.en: Lin Rong-san's nephew, eldest son of Lin Yu-chi. He served as Vice Chairman of Hung Kuo Construction and Chairman & General Manager of Taipei 101.

description.zh-cn: 林荣三的外甥，曾任台北市议员。
description.en: Lin Rong-san's nephew, former member of the Taipei City Council.

description.zh-cn: 林荣三的外甥，曾任立法委员。
description.en: Lin Rong-san's nephew, former member of the Legislative Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 林荣三的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Lin Rong-san.

description.zh-cn: 林荣三的长子，现任联邦商业银行董事长。
description.en: Lin Rong-san's eldest son, current Chairman of Union Bank of Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 林荣三的次子，现任《自由时报》社长。
description.en: Lin Rong-san's second son, current President of the Liberty Times.

description.zh-cn: 林荣三的长女。
description.en: Lin Rong-san's eldest daughter.

description.zh-cn: 林荣三的么子，现任珑山林企业董事长。
description.en: Lin Rong-san's youngest son, current Chairman of Longsanlin Enterprise.

nodes.id: 台北市私立开南高级商工职业学校

zh-cn: 台北市私立开南高级商工职业学校
开南高级商工职业学校

description.zh-cn: 位于台北市的职业学校，林荣三的母校。
description.en: A vocational school in Taipei City, the alma mater of Lin Rong-san.

description.zh-cn: 位于新北市的大学，曾授予林荣三名誉法学博士学位。
description.en: A university in New Taipei City that awarded Lin Rong-san an honorary Doctor of Laws degree.

nodes.id: 林荣三文化公益基金会

zh-cn: 林荣三文化公益基金会

description.zh-cn: 由林荣三出资成立的基金会。
description.en: A foundation established with funding from Lin Rong-san.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国前总统，林荣三曾是其在商界的强力支持者。
description.en: Former President of the Republic of China, for whom Lin Rong-san was a strong supporter in the business community.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的主要政党之一，林荣三在2000年后开始支持该党。
description.en: One of the major political parties in the Republic of China, which Lin Rong-san began to support after 2000.

description.zh-cn: 台湾北部的商帮之一，林荣三是其重要成员。
description.en: One of the business cliques in northern Taiwan, of which Lin Rong-san was a key member.

description.zh-cn: 由林荣三创办的台湾报纸，前身为《自强日报》。
description.en: A Taiwanese newspaper founded by Lin Rong-san, formerly known as Ziqiang Daily.

description.zh-cn: 由林荣三长兄林堉琪创办的企业集团。
description.en: An enterprise group founded by Lin Rong-san's eldest brother, Lin Yu-chi.

description.zh-cn: 由林荣三二哥林堉璘创办的企业集团。
description.en: An enterprise group founded by Lin Rong-san's second elder brother, Lin Yu-lin.

description.zh-cn: 位于新北市芦洲区的小学，林荣三的母校。
description.en: An elementary school in Luzhou District, New Taipei City, the alma mater of Lin Rong-san.

description.zh-cn: 由林荣三、林堉琪、林堉璘三兄弟共同创立的建设公司。
description.en: A construction company co-founded by the three brothers: Lin Rong-san, Lin Yu-chi, and Lin Yu-lin.

description.zh-cn: 由林荣三于1971年成立的建设公司。
description.en: A construction company established by Lin Rong-san in 1971.

description.zh-cn: 三重帮大老，曾任台北县长，将林荣三引入政坛。
description.en: A key figure in the Sanchong Gang and former Taipei County Magistrate, who introduced Lin Rong-san to politics.

description.zh-cn: 台湾党外运动大老，曾在1975年立法委员选举中与林荣三竞争。
description.en: A key figure in Taiwan's Tangwai movement, who competed with Lin Rong-san in the 1975 legislative election.

description.zh-cn: 台湾报纸，林荣三曾任其董事长。
description.en: A Taiwanese newspaper for which Lin Rong-san once served as chairman.

description.zh-cn: 《自由时报》的前身，1980年被林荣三的联邦集团收购。
description.en: The predecessor of the Liberty Times, acquired by Lin Rong-san's Federal Group in 1980.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省的最高民意机关，于1980年选举林荣三为增额监察委员。
description.en: The highest representative body of Taiwan Province, Republic of China, which elected Lin Rong-san as an incremental Control Yuan Member in 1980.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国前总统，其逝世后，继任者李登辉解除了报禁。
description.en: Former President of the Republic of China, after whose death his successor Lee Teng-hui lifted the press ban.

description.zh-cn: 台湾戒严时期的报纸出版限制政策，于1988年解除。
description.en: The newspaper publishing restriction policy during Taiwan's martial law period, which was lifted in 1988.

description.zh-cn: 由林荣三于1990年参与设立的银行。
description.en: A bank that Lin Rong-san participated in establishing in 1990.

description.zh-cn: 台湾主要报纸之一，曾是《自由时报》的主要竞争对手，并长期抨击李登辉。
description.en: One of Taiwan's major newspapers, a main competitor of the Liberty Times, and a long-time critic of Lee Teng-hui.

description.zh-cn: 台湾主要报纸之一，曾是《自由时报》的主要竞争对手。
description.en: One of Taiwan's major newspapers and a main competitor of the Liberty Times.

nodes.id: 中华民国总统府国策顾问

zh-cn: 中华民国总统府国策顾问

description.zh-cn: 中华民国总统府的顾问职位，林荣三曾受聘担任此职。
description.en: An advisory position in the Office of the President of the Republic of China, which Lin Rong-san was appointed to.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国前总统，曾授予林荣三二等卿云勋章。
description.en: Former President of the Republic of China, who awarded Lin Rong-san the Order of Propitious Clouds with Grand Cordon.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国文职勋章，陈水扁曾授予林荣三二等卿云勋章。
description.en: A civilian order of the Republic of China. Chen Shui-bian awarded Lin Rong-san the Order of Propitious Clouds with Grand Cordon.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国文职勋章，林荣三曾获颁二等景星勋章。
description.en: A civilian order of the Republic of China. Lin Rong-san was awarded the Order of Brilliant Star with Grand Cordon.

description.zh-cn: 林荣三的姐姐，陈宏昌之母。
description.en: Lin Rong-san's sister, mother of Chen Hung-chang.

description.zh-cn: 林荣三的姐夫，林满的丈夫，陈宏昌之父。
description.en: Lin Rong-san's brother-in-law, husband of Lin Man, father of Chen Hung-chang.

description.zh-cn: 林荣三的大嫂，林堉琪的妻子。
description.en: Lin Rong-san's sister-in-law, wife of Lin Yu-chi.

description.zh-cn: 前国民大会议长，林谢罕见之弟。
description.en: Former Speaker of the National Assembly, younger brother of Lin Hsieh Han-chien.

description.zh-cn: 联邦集团旗下的企业，现由林荣三么子林鸿尧担任董事长。
description.en: An enterprise under the Federal Group, currently chaired by Lin Rong-san's youngest son, Lin Hung-yao.

description.zh-cn: 位于新北市的有线电视公司，林荣三长女林雅真任董事。
description.en: A cable television company in New Taipei City, where Lin Rong-san's eldest daughter Lin Ya-chen serves as a director.

description.zh-cn: 林荣三的姪子，林堉琪之次子，曾任中华奥林匹克委员会主席。
description.en: Lin Rong-san's nephew, second son of Lin Yu-chi, former President of the Chinese Taipei Olympic Committee.

description.zh-cn: 代表台湾地区的国家奥林匹克委员会。
description.en: The National Olympic Committee representing the region of Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 林荣三接替马空群担任监察院副院长。
description.en: Lin Rong-san succeeded Ma Kung-chun as Vice President of the Control Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 郑水枝接替林荣三担任监察院副院长。
description.en: Cheng Shui-chih succeeded Lin Rong-san as Vice President of the Control Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 林荣三担任监察院副院长期间，黄尊秋为监察院院长。
description.en: While Lin Rong-san served as Vice President of the Control Yuan, Huang Tsun-chiu was the President.

description.zh-cn: 林荣三是联邦集团的创办人。
description.en: Lin Rong-san is the founder of the Federal Group.

description.zh-cn: 林鸿明是林荣三的姪子。
description.en: Lin Hung-ming is Lin Rong-san's nephew.

description.zh-cn: 陈政忠是林荣三的外甥。
description.en: Chen Cheng-chung is Lin Rong-san's nephew.

description.zh-cn: 陈宏昌是林荣三的外甥。
description.en: Chen Hung-chang is Lin Rong-san's nephew.

relationships.target: 台北市私立开南高级商工职业学校

description.zh-cn: 1964年于高级部毕业。
description.en: Graduated from the senior division in 1964.

description.zh-cn: 授予林荣三名誉法学博士学位。
description.en: Awarded an honorary Doctor of Laws degree to Lin Rong-san.

description.zh-cn: 林荣三被视为时任总统李登辉在商界的强力支持者。
description.en: Lin Rong-san was considered a strong supporter of then-President Lee Teng-hui in the business community.

description.zh-cn: 聘请林荣三为总统府国策顾问。
description.en: Appointed Lin Rong-san as a National Policy Advisor to the President.

description.zh-cn: 2000年后开始支持民主进步党。
description.en: Began supporting the Democratic Progressive Party after 2000.

description.zh-cn: 林荣三是三重帮重要成员。
description.en: Lin Rong-san was a key member of the Sanchong Gang.

description.zh-cn: 林荣三的联邦集团收购了《自强日报》，并将其改名为《自由日报》（后为《自由时报》），林荣三自任创办人。
description.en: Lin Rong-san's Federal Group acquired the Ziqiang Daily and renamed it the Liberty Daily (later Liberty Times), with Lin serving as its founder.

description.zh-cn: 与兄长林堉琪、林堉璘共同创立。
description.en: Co-founded with his brothers Lin Yu-chi and Lin Yu-lin.

description.zh-cn: 与弟弟林堉璘、林荣三共同创立。
description.en: Co-founded with his younger brothers Lin Yu-lin and Lin Rong-san.

description.zh-cn: 与兄长林堉琪、弟弟林荣三共同创立。
description.en: Co-founded with his elder brother Lin Yu-chi and younger brother Lin Rong-san.

description.zh-cn: 介绍并鼓励林荣三参选立法委员。
description.en: Introduced and encouraged Lin Rong-san to run for legislator.

description.zh-cn: 在1975年立法委员选举中互为竞争对手。
description.en: Were competitors in the 1975 legislative election.

description.zh-cn: 《自强日报》被收购后改名为《自由时报》的前身《自由日报》。
description.en: After being acquired, Ziqiang Daily was renamed Liberty Daily, the predecessor of Liberty Times.

description.zh-cn: 选举林荣三为增额监察委员。
description.en: Elected Lin Rong-san as an incremental Control Yuan Member.

description.zh-cn: 继任总统后解除报禁。
description.en: Lifted the press ban after becoming president.

description.zh-cn: 《自由时报》在李登辉执政时期成为旗帜鲜明的“拥李派”，全面支援以李登辉为首的当权派。
description.en: During Lee Teng-hui's presidency, the Liberty Times became a staunch 'pro-Lee faction', fully supporting the ruling faction led by Lee.

description.zh-cn: 出资参与设立联邦银行。
description.en: Invested in and participated in the establishment of Union Bank of Taiwan.

relationships.target: 林荣三文化公益基金会

description.zh-cn: 《联合报》长年抨击李登辉。
description.en: The United Daily News criticized Lee Teng-hui for many years.

relationships.target: 中华民国总统府国策顾问

description.zh-cn: 授予林荣三二等卿云勋章。
description.en: Awarded Lin Rong-san the Order of Propitious Clouds with Grand Cordon.

description.zh-cn: 批准授予林荣三二等景星勋章。
description.en: Approved the award of the Order of Brilliant Star with Grand Cordon to Lin Rong-san.
